metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1583 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference was found in io_file_bitmap_get inio_uring/filetable.c in the io_uring sub-component in the Linux Kernel.When fixed files are unregistered, some context information(file_alloc_{start,end} and alloc_hint) is not cleared. A subsequentrequest that has auto index selection enabled via IORING_FILE_INDEX_ALLOCcan cause a NULL pointer dereference. An unprivileged user can use the flawto cause a system crash.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
